resource: 1001616.derived=false 1001616.description=All-wheel-drive models come equipped with run-flat tires. Run-flat tire technology is designed for limited emergency use only. If air pressure is lost, vehicle speed must remain below 55 miles per hour; cornering, braking and accelerating must be done with extreme caution; and the tire should be replaced within 100 miles. See your Toyota dealer for details. [runflat_tire.html] 1001616.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1001616.1000851.1000866.description=All-wheel-drive models come equipped with run-flat tires. Run-flat tire technology is designed for limited emergency use only. If air pressure is lost, vehicle speed must remain below 55 miles per hour; cornering, braking and accelerating must be done with extreme caution; and the tire should be replaced within 100 miles. See your Toyota dealer for details. 1001616.vtc=true
